body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Andrew Young, and I'm with Precision Accounting Solutions. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Elizabeth Garcia.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Elizabeth. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit confused about an issue I'm having with my inventory. It doesn't seem to be matching up with my accounting records.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be concerning. To better assist you, may I have your account number and the name of your business?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My account number is one two three four five six seven eight, and my business is called 'Garcia Goods'.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Elizabeth. Let me pull up your information. Meanwhile, could you tell me when you first noticed this issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I first noticed it about a week ago. It's been bothering me since.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Understood. I'll look into this immediately. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Andrew. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Elizabeth. It's my job to ensure everything runs smoothly for you. I'll get back to you as soon as I have an update. Thank you for your time today.
